formattedAddress: 456 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 456 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chic rooms & suites in a choice, French-style hotel with a spa, a brasserie & a bar, plus a cinema.

originalText.text: Hotel Fouquet is truly one of the most incredible hotels I have had the pleasure of enjoying. Everything from the ambiance, service, staff, rooms were excellent!! The staff truly went above and beyond to make our stay so special. The vibe was so elegant while comfortable. The restaurant was absolutely amazing!! This is an absolute go to if you are going to New York!!

text.text: Hotel Fouquet is truly one of the most incredible hotels I have had the pleasure of enjoying. Everything from the ambiance, service, staff, rooms were excellent!! The staff truly went above and beyond to make our stay so special. The vibe was so elegant while comfortable. The restaurant was absolutely amazing!! This is an absolute go to if you are going to New York!!

originalText.text: I enjoyed my stay there so much. Their service is so above beyond. Especially Natalie and Luis at the front desk, not only they showed us around the hotel when we checked in, they also made the reservation at the bar for us even last minute. the room is just so chic. I love the marble in the bathroom and the details in the room are so fantastic! I highly recommend if you visit NYC,

text.text: I enjoyed my stay there so much. Their service is so above beyond. Especially Natalie and Luis at the front desk, not only they showed us around the hotel when we checked in, they also made the reservation at the bar for us even last minute. the room is just so chic. originalText.text: Stayed for my husband's birthday weekend recently, after falling in love with the spa and enjoying the restaurants over the last year. Pretty fabulous hotel with true 5-star services and amenities -- room service was incredible, lots of little gifts and thoughtful touches, early check in, late check out, a nice table at Titsou every night. Really fun location and my favorite spa in the city right now. Suite was spacious, well-designed and comfortable, with an epic mini bar.

text.text: Stayed for my husband's birthday weekend recently, after falling in love with the spa and enjoying the restaurants over the last year. Pretty fabulous hotel with true 5-star services and amenities -- room service was incredible, lots of little gifts and thoughtful touches, early check in, late check out, a nice table at Titsou every night. Really fun location and my favorite spa in the city right now. Suite was spacious, well-designed and comfortable, with an epic mini bar.

originalText.text: I am usually a Marriott person, but this was an invitation for an event so I went non Marriott for the first time in a few years. I got to say i was impressed. The rooms were beautiful, the staff was super friendly and the overall ambience was great. If Marriott would be gone tomorrow and this hotel had a rewards program, I would be there again!

text.text: I am usually a Marriott person, but this was an invitation for an event so I went non Marriott for the first time in a few years. I got to say i was impressed. The rooms were beautiful, the staff was super friendly and the overall ambience was great. If Marriott would be gone tomorrow and this hotel had a rewards program, I would be there again!

originalText.text: This review is of the Titsou bar in Hotel Fouquet. It reminds me of the great bar in FiDi’s Four Season hotel.  Beautiful bar and great cocktails and really nice service.   Connor the bartender made incredibly delicious cocktails.  Relaxing experience.  Hostess and note staff were very nice and helpful.   Would definitely come back!
